front.title: Unapproved IEEE Draft Standard for the Functional Verification Language 'E' (Replaced by the Approved IEEE Draft)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The scope of this standard is the definition of the e functional verification language. This standard aims to serve as an authoritative source for the definition of (a) syntax and semantics of e language constructs (b) the e language interaction with standard simulation languages (c) e language libraries This revision extends the standard to cover novel verification-related features.
